mapper.select: SELECT SR.KID , SR.TITLE , SR.CONTENT , SR.TYPE , SR.REG_DT AS regDt , SR.STAT_FL AS statFl , SR.REG_KID AS regKid , RG.NAME AS regName , RG.ID AS regId , SR.CHAR_KID AS charKid , CHR.NAME AS charName , CHR.ID AS charId FROM SR SR , USER RG , USER CHR WHERE SR.REG_KID = RG.KID AND SR.CHAR_KID = CHR.KID
